drug_concept_id.description: User Guidance: The Concept representing the Branded Drug or Clinical Drug Product.

ingredient_concept_id.description:
User Guidance: The Concept representing the active ingredient contained within the drug product.

ETL Conventions: Combination Drugs will have more than one record in this table, one for each active Ingredient.

amount_value.description: User Guidance: The numeric value or the amount of active ingredient contained within the drug product.

amount_unit_concept_id.description: User Guidance: The Concept representing the Unit of measure for the amount of active ingredient contained within the drug product.

numerator_value.description: User Guidance: The concentration of the active ingredient contained within the drug product.

numerator_unit_concept_id.description: User Guidance: The Concept representing the Unit of measure for the concentration of active ingredient.

denominator_value.description: User Guidance: The amount of total liquid (or other divisible product, such as ointment, gel, spray, etc.).

denominator_unit_concept_id.description: User Guidance: The Concept representing the denominator unit for the concentration of active ingredient.

box_size.description: User Guidance: The number of units of Clinical Branded Drug or Quantified Clinical or Branded Drug contained in a box as dispensed to the patient.

valid_start_date.description:
User Guidance: The date when the Concept was first
recorded. The default value is
1-Jan-1970.

valid_end_date.description: User Guidance: The date when then Concept became invalid.

invalid_reason.description: User Guidance: Reason the concept was invalidated. Possible values are D (deleted), U (replaced with an update) or NULL when valid_end_date has the default value.
